CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PSC devices were fabricated with an inverted architecture ( ITO / ZnO / polymer : PC71BM / MoO 3 / Ag ) in order to further improve the photovoltaic performance , the PCEs of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP - based devices were improved to 7.02% and 5.22% , respectively ( Fig.

Let's think step by step.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide
3. PC71BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
4. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide
5. Ag: Silver

These are the Material Name entities mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide
2. ZnO: Zinc Oxide
3. PC71BM: Poly(3-hexylthiophene-2,5-diyl-alt-[6,6]-phenyl-C61-butyric acid methyl ester)
4. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to Material Names.

| --- |

| Zinc Oxide (ZnO) |

| Molybdenum Trioxide (MoO3) |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PSC devices were fabricated with an inverted architecture ( ITO / ZnO / polymer : PC71BM / MoO 3 / Ag ) in order to further improve the photovoltaic performance , the PCEs of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP - based devices were improved to 7.02% and 5.22% , respectively ( Fig.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSC devices: Organic Photovoltaic (OPV) or Polymer Solar Cells
2. PSC devices (with inverted architecture): Devices with a specific structure for OPVs
3. ITO: Indium Tin Oxide, a conductive material used in the electrode
4. ZnO: Zinc Oxide, a material used in the electrode
5. polymer: Organic material used as the active layer in OPVs
6. PC71BM: Specific type of organic material used as the active layer in OPVs
7. MoO3: Molybdenum Trioxide, a material used as a hole transporting material
8. Ag: Silver, a material used as a contact layer in the electrode.

So, the Property Names in the paragraph are:
1. PSC devices
2. Inverted architecture
3. ITO
4. ZnO
5. polymer
6. PC71BM
7. MoO3
8. Ag.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. ITO
2. ZnO
3. polymer (specifically, the type of polymer, PC71BM, can be considered a material property)
4. MoO3.

So, the relevant Material Property Entities in the paragraph are:
1. ITO
2. ZnO
3. polymer (PC71BM)
4. MoO3.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) |
| ZnO (Zinc Oxide) |
| polymer (PC71BM) |
| MoO3 (Molybdenum Trioxide) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: When the PSC devices were fabricated with an inverted architecture ( ITO / ZnO / polymer : PC71BM / MoO 3 / Ag ) in order to further improve the photovoltaic performance , the PCEs of PTATDPP and PTAFDPP - based devices were improved to 7.02% and 5.22% , respectively ( Fig.

Let's think step by step.

1. PSC devices: These are the photoelectrochemical devices being fabricated with a specific architecture.
2. Inverted architecture: This refers to the order in which the materials are layered in the fabrication of the PSC devices. In this case, it is ITO / ZnO / polymer : PC71BM / MoO3 / Ag.
3. PTATDPP and PTAFDPP: These are likely types or models of the PSC devices being discussed.
4. PCEs: This stands for Power Conversion Efficiency, which is a measure of the device's ability to convert light energy into electrical energy.
5. 7.02% and 5.22%: These are the improved Power Conversion Efficiencies for the PTATDPP and PTAFDPP devices, respectively.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. 7.02% and 5.22%: These are the improved Power Conversion Efficiencies for the PTATDPP and PTAFDPP devices, respectively.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| Improved PCE of PTATDPP device: 7.02% |
| Improved PCE of PTAFDPP device: 5.22% |
